title: Organophosphate esters uptake, translocation and accumulation in rice (Oryza sativa L.): Impacts of lipid transporters and chemical properties
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00132J, Paper
Wenxuan Wang, Haiou Wang, Xiaoyu Ren, Wenxiao Zhang, Qian Li
To explore key factors involving organophosphate esters (OPEs) uptake, translocation and accumulation, computer simulation analysis and hydroponic experiment were executed. The lipid transporters with stocky-like active (SAC) cavities usually owned...
